# Get precip and temp cropped
```{r read data}
library(raster)

# read rasters
lc     = raster('H:/esm215/lab3_agents/rasters/lc.img')
precip = raster('C:/Temp/bbest/data/prism_microclimates/precip_cp.tif')
temp   = raster('C:/Temp/bbest/data/prism_microclimates/temp_cp.tif')

# crop rasters
precip_c = crop(precip, lc)
temp_c   = crop(temp, lc)

# write rasters
writeRaster(precip_c, 'H:/esm215/lab3_agents/rasters/precip.tif')
writeRaster(temp_c, 'H:/esm215/lab3_agents/rasters/temp.tif')

```
